item.title: Node.js and Express - Strange Http Status Codes
item.description: Testing the C# code showed me something that was a bit odd - GETs and POSTSs were working fine, but PUTs and DELETEs were showing an HTTP Status code of ‘1’ (which isn't a valid code). Here's the what I was seeing: Checking the node server showed the same thing - DELETEs were returning status 1. The server code is very lightweight so it's quick to see what's going on:
